name: Inator
description:
VR-JAM 2020 entry.

Runs on an Oculus Quest. We have a working version for other headsets as well, but I messed up the executable upload because I'm a big dumb baby :)

Scan an object to make an object-inator, and shoot it as something to -inate it.

This game was made by two very amateur devs who had a lot of fun.

https://github.com/jakeparente/Inator
